Author: WinonaQuimby
Text: Seconding the advice to never weigh on carpet! If you keep seeing bizarre jumps when you're only weighing in the bathroom, it probs just needs a new battery.

Author: lurking_60
Text: weighing on carpet isn’t accurate! tile is best, or wood floors. keep weighing yourself that way, it’ll be way better  If you’re worried abt your real weight then is there a location w a scale outside of your home you can go to? A gym, maybe? Rn I’d go with the bathroom number but i get that such a big leap in lbs can seem crazy
